column4: have problem.. since today morning i cant login to ubuntu 11.10.. when i type my password i see black thingie for quick sec and then it goes back to login screen
tried a different session? like Unity2D?
they will always run and are seperate to the desktop
however if i login with other username.. i can login but i dont see any toolbar on left or so
is your user the owner of all of it's data and do all partitions have more than 10% free space
have you checked the ownerships?
the services you are naming will run regardless of the desktop situation, they are daemons so it doesn't matter that you cannot login to them, it's not a test of anthing ecept that they get started
if you make a fresh ubutu user and login, is the session ok?
then its the apps, not your user settings having issue
what GPU do you use?
, any idea what i could do?
no idea, maybe others can advise
what if i try to update to 12.04
try not hitting ENtER after every 3rd word
if it does, just restore settings etc from bsckup
have you also asked in #php ?
just means you need to be identified and registered
do you have the bold version of the font?
I suggest you check it
i installed the win7 fonts, refreshed cache right now
I suggest you reinstall the bold font after removing it
i will reinstall it ok, but i am 100% sure the font is ok as i copied it from linux box to windows desktop and even opened it to see its the right font
